content: अवसृज् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To throw or cast down, pour out, let fall, drop; <ls>U. 3. 23</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 8</ls>; so सायकान्, बीजं, वृष्टिं &c. {@--2@} To let loose, liberate, dismiss &c. {@--3@} To remit. {@--4@} To form; create. {@--5@} To place on, throw or cast at. {@--6@} To leave, give up, abandon; as क्रोधं, वैरं &c.
